name: Electron Korea
tagline: Let's share your knowledge and experience for Electron
body:
### Electron Korea

Welcome! Electron Korea is users group for loving people who want to use and invest about technologies related to [Electron](https://electron.atom.io) developed by Github.

### Meetup

We have annual meet-ups once a month in Korea to share our knowledge and experience in offline. Please come to us if you have an interesting of Electron. More information to visit out [meetup](http://www.meetup.com/electron-kr/)

### Communications

Slack, which is our primary place to communicate each others. Having desire with sharing any information or communication for Electron? Please join us on Slack channel. Please refer to information below.

1. Sign up via [web page of inviting](https://electron-kr.herokuapp.com/)
2. Join to [Slack channel](https://electron-kr.slack.com)

If you're familiar with Facebook style? Please visit to [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/groups/808628819214318/) but It works only to share news of our meet-up.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
